law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 94, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 367, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 6. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4434-27.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Report of census to superintendent of public instruction.
